text: Medina Dixon (November 2, 1962 – November 8, 2021) was an American basketball player. She was born in Boston, Massachusetts. She was a member of the United States women's national basketball team during the late 1980s and the early 1990s. She also played for Old Dominion University's women's basketball team. She won a bronze medal at the 1992 Summer Olympics. Dixon died on November 8, 2021 from pancreatic cancer in Boston, aged 59.Boston women’s basketball legend Medina Dixon dies at 59 ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American basketball players Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Boston Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer
title: Medina Dixon
